thread.title: Gautam Gupta to quit Meri Aashiqui?
thread.title_full: Gautam Gupta to quit Meri Aashiqui?

author: Deccan
title: Gautam Gupta to quit Meri Aashiqui?
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Natasha Coutinho | October 23, 2015, 23.31 pm Gautam Gupta Gautam Gupta, who is currently seen as the lead, Madhavan, in the show Kuch Toh Hai Tere Mere Darmiyaan, is apparently contemplating quitting his parallel show, Meri Aashiqui Tumse Hi. Gautam is finding it difficult to manage time since the two shows are dailys. A source says, “Shooting day and night without a break is affecting Gautam’s health. Time management is a big problem for both teams so he was heard mulling over the thought on the KTHTMD sets but hasn’t finalised his decision yet.” However, when we contacted the actor, he said, “I am not quitting Meri Aashiqui.”
